alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wabasha County through 615 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goodhue, or 14 miles south of Red Wing, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mazeppa around 520 PM CDT. Wabasha, Alma and Kellogg around 615 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
